description: Retrieves a list of data quality results for the specified result IDs.

nested_items.name: Results
nested_items.description: A list of DataQualityResult objects representing the data quality results.

nested_items.name: ResultId
nested_items.description: A unique result ID for the data quality result.

nested_items.name: ProfileId
nested_items.description: The Profile ID for the data quality result.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: An aggregate data quality score. Represents the ratio of rules that passed to the total number of rules.

nested_items.name: DataSource
nested_items.description: The table associated with the data quality result, if any.

nested_items.name: GlueTable
nested_items.description: An Glue table.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: A database name in the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: A table name in the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: ConnectionName
nested_items.description: The name of the connection to the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: AdditionalOptions
nested_items.description: Additional options for the table. Currently there are two keys supported:
pushDownPredicate: to filter on partitions without having to list and read all the files in your dataset.
catalogPartitionPredicate: to use server-side partition pruning using partition indexes in the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: RulesetName
nested_items.description: The name of the ruleset associated with the data quality result.

nested_items.name: EvaluationContext
nested_items.description: In the context of a job in Glue Studio, each node in the canvas is typically assigned some sort of name and data quality nodes will have names. In the case of multiple nodes, the evaluationContext can differentiate the nodes.

nested_items.name: StartedOn
nested_items.description: The date and time when this data quality run started.

nested_items.name: CompletedOn
nested_items.description: The date and time when this data quality run completed.

nested_items.name: JobName
nested_items.description: The job name associated with the data quality result, if any.

nested_items.name: JobRunId
nested_items.description: The job run ID associated with the data quality result, if any.

nested_items.name: RulesetEvaluationRunId
nested_items.description: The unique run ID for the ruleset evaluation for this data quality result.

nested_items.name: RuleResults
nested_items.description: A list of DataQualityRuleResult objects representing the results for each rule.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the data quality rule.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the data quality rule.

nested_items.name: EvaluationMessage
nested_items.description: An evaluation message.

nested_items.name: Result
nested_items.description: A pass or fail status for the rule.

nested_items.name: EvaluatedMetrics
nested_items.description: A map of metrics associated with the evaluation of the rule.
(string) ---
(float) ---

nested_items.name: EvaluatedRule
nested_items.description: The evaluated rule.

nested_items.name: AnalyzerResults
nested_items.description: A list of DataQualityAnalyzerResult objects representing the results for each analyzer.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the data quality analyzer.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the data quality analyzer.

nested_items.name: EvaluationMessage
nested_items.description: An evaluation message.

nested_items.name: EvaluatedMetrics
nested_items.description: A map of metrics associated with the evaluation of the analyzer.
(string) ---
(float) ---

nested_items.name: Observations
nested_items.description: A list of DataQualityObservation objects representing the observations generated after evaluating the rules and analyzers.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the data quality observation.

nested_items.name: MetricBasedObservation
nested_items.description: An object of type MetricBasedObservation representing the observation that is based on evaluated data quality metrics.

nested_items.name: MetricName
nested_items.description: The name of the data quality metric used for generating the observation.

nested_items.name: StatisticId
nested_items.description: The Statistic ID.

nested_items.name: MetricValues
nested_items.description: An object of type DataQualityMetricValues representing the analysis of the data quality metric value.

nested_items.name: ActualValue
nested_items.description: The actual value of the data quality metric.

nested_items.name: ExpectedValue
nested_items.description: The expected value of the data quality metric according to the analysis of historical data.

nested_items.name: LowerLimit
nested_items.description: The lower limit of the data quality metric value according to the analysis of historical data.

nested_items.name: UpperLimit
nested_items.description: The upper limit of the data quality metric value according to the analysis of historical data.

nested_items.name: NewRules
nested_items.description: A list of new data quality rules generated as part of the observation based on the data quality metric value.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ResultsNotFound
nested_items.description: A list of result IDs for which results were not found.
(string) ---
